com.redhat.rhn.common.hibernate

Class HibernateFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.redhat.rhn.common.hibernate.HibernateFactory
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActionChainFactory, ActionFactory, ActivationKeyFactory, ChannelFactory, ChannelFamilyFactory, ChecksumFactory, CommonFactory, ConfigurationFactory, CrashFactory, CredentialsFactory, CveFactory, ErrataCacheManager, ErrataFactory, IssFactory, KickstartFactory, LoggingFactory, OrgFactory, PackageFactory, ProfileFactory, ResetPasswordFactory, RhnSetFactory, RoleFactory, SatConfigFactory, ScapFactory, ServerFactory, ServerGroupFactory, ServerNoteFactory, SystemMigrationFactory, TaskFactory, TaskoFactory, TestFactory, TokenFactory, TokenPackageFactory, UserFactory, UserGroupFactory, VirtualInstanceFactory, WebSessionFactory

    public abstract class HibernateFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    HibernateFactory - Helper superclass that contains methods for fetching and storing Objects from the DB using Hibernate.

    Abstract methods define what the subclass must implement to determine what is specific to that Factory's instance.

      • lookupObjectByNamedQuery

        protected java.lang.Object lookupObjectByNamedQuery(java.lang.String qryName,
                                        java.util.Map qryParams)
        Finds a single instance of a persistent object given a named query.
        Parameters:
        qryName - The name of the query used to find the persistent object. It should be formulated to ensure a single object is returned or an error will occur.
        qryParams - Map of named bind parameters whose keys are Strings. The map can also be null.
        Returns:
        Object found by named query or null if nothing found.

      • lookupObjectByNamedQuery

        protected java.lang.Object lookupObjectByNamedQuery(java.lang.String qryName,
                                        java.util.Map qryParams,
                                        boolean cacheable)
        Finds a single instance of a persistent object given a named query.
        Parameters:
        qryName - The name of the query used to find the persistent object. It should be formulated to ensure a single object is returned or an error will occur.
        qryParams - Map of named bind parameters whose keys are Strings. The map can also be null.
        cacheable - if we should cache the results of this object
        Returns:
        Object found by named query or null if nothing found.

      • listObjectsByNamedQuery

        protected java.util.List listObjectsByNamedQuery(java.lang.String qryName,
                                     java.util.Map qryParams)
        Using a named query, find all the objects matching the criteria within. Warning: This can be very expensive if the returned list is large. Use only for small tables with static data
        Parameters:
        qryName - Named query to use to find a list of objects.
        qryParams - Map of named bind parameters whose keys are Strings. The map can also be null.
        Returns:
        List of objects returned by named query, or null if nothing found.

      • listObjectsByNamedQuery

        protected java.util.List listObjectsByNamedQuery(java.lang.String qryName,
                                     java.util.Map qryParams,
                                     java.util.Collection col,
                                     java.lang.String colLabel)
        Using a named query, find all the objects matching the criteria within. Warning: This can be very expensive if the returned list is large. Use only for small tables with static data
        Parameters:
        qryName - Named query to use to find a list of objects.
        qryParams - Map of named bind parameters whose keys are Strings. The map can also be null.
        col - the collection to use as an inclause
        colLabel - the label the collection will have
        Returns:
        List of objects returned by named query, or null if nothing found.

      • listObjectsByNamedQuery

        protected java.util.List listObjectsByNamedQuery(java.lang.String qryName,
                                     java.util.Map qryParams,
                                     boolean cacheable)
        Using a named query, find all the objects matching the criteria within. Warning: This can be very expensive if the returned list is large. Use only for small tables with static data
        Parameters:
        qryName - Named query to use to find a list of objects.
        qryParams - Map of named bind parameters whose keys are Strings. The map can also be null.
        cacheable - if we should cache the results of this query
        Returns:
        List of objects returned by named query, or null if nothing found.

      • getSession

        public static Session getSession()
        Returns the Hibernate session stored in ThreadLocal storage. If not present, creates a new one and stores it in ThreadLocal; creating the session also begins a transaction implicitly.
        Returns:
        Session Session asked for

      • commitTransaction

        public static void commitTransaction()
                              throws HibernateException
        Commit the transaction for the current session. This method or rollbackTransaction()can only be called once per session.
        Throws:
        HibernateException - if the commit fails

      • rollbackTransaction

        public static void rollbackTransaction()
                                throws HibernateException
        Roll the transaction for the current session back. This method or commitTransaction()can only be called once per session.
        Throws:
        HibernateException - if the commit fails

      • getObject

        public java.lang.Object getObject(java.lang.Class clazz,
                         java.io.Serializable id)
        Return the persistent instance of the given entity class with the given identifier, or null if there is no such persistent instance. (If the instance, or a proxy for the instance, is already associated with the session, return that instance or proxy.)
        Parameters:
        clazz - a persistent class
        id - an identifier
        Returns:
        Object persistent instance or null

      • lockObject

        protected java.lang.Object lockObject(java.lang.Class clazz,
                          java.io.Serializable id)
        Return a locked persistent instance of the given entity class with the given identifier, or null if there is no such persistent instance. (If the instance, or a proxy for the instance, is already associated with the session, return that instance or proxy.)
        Parameters:
        clazz - a persistent class
        id - an identifier
        Returns:
        Object persistent instance or null

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getByteArrayContents

        public static java.lang.String getByteArrayContents(byte[] barr)
        Get the String version of the byte array contents used to return the string representation of byte arrays constructed from blobs
        Parameters:
        barr - byte array to convert to String
        Returns:
        String version of the byte array contents

      • getBlobContents

        public static java.lang.String getBlobContents(java.lang.Object blob)
        Get the String version of an object corresponding to a BLOB column Handles both the byte[] and the Blob cases
        Parameters:
        blob - the blob to handle
        Returns:
        String version of the blob contents, null if the blob was null or if the specified object is not actually a Blob

      • byteArrayToBlob

        public static java.sql.Blob byteArrayToBlob(byte[] data)
        Convert a byte[] array to a Blob object. Guards against null arrays and 0 length arrays.
        Parameters:
        data - array to convert to a Blob
        Returns:
        Blob if data[] is non-null and length > 0, null otherwise

      • stringToByteArray

        public static byte[] stringToByteArray(java.lang.String data)
        Convert a String to a byte[] object. Guards against null arrays and 0 length arrays.
        Parameters:
        data - string to convert to a Blob
        Returns:
        Blob if data[] is non-null and length > 0, null otherwise
